item.title: JPMorgan Rolls Out Stablecoin JPMD On Coinbase – ‘On-Chain Payments Are The Future’ Says Brian Armstrong
item.description: The stablecoin is currently only for institutional transfers but JPMorgan has plans to expand its usage to clients’ customers in the future.

item.title: White House ‘Very Hopeful’ That US Shutdown Will End Tonight – October Jobs, CPI Data May Never Be Released
item.description: U.S. Press Secretary Karoline Leavitt said the shutdown could reduce U.S. economic growth in the fourth quarter by two percentage points.

item.title: AbbVie Reportedly Ends Partnership With Alphabet-Backed Calico Life Sciences
item.description: Stat News reported on Wednesday, citing internal emails, that the move comes amid AbbVie’s shift away from small-molecule drugs, including pills.

item.title: EU To Launch Probe Into Google’s Ranking of News Publishers in Search Results: Report
item.description: The EU will probe under the Digital Markets Act (DMA) to examine claims that Google downranks publishers with sponsored content.

item.title: Microsoft Unveils Atlanta Datacenter As Part Of ‘AI Superfactory’ Network
item.description: The site, called Fairwater Atlanta, officially began operations in October and represents a new generation of datacenters purpose-built for large-scal...
